titleInfo.title: Interior of Goldberg Brothers Tinners with Employees

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 4 x 5 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on envelope: ''#520 Goldberg Bros.'' On back of photograph: ''#520 Goldberg Brothers, Tinners c 19 Donor Normon Goldberg l to r: Louis, Nathan and William Goldberg.''

mods.abstract: Interior of Goldberg Brothers, Tinners. From left to right: Louis, Nathan and William Goldberg with three unidentified men.
mods.note: Appears in ''Images of America: Jewish Denver 1859-1940,'' by Dr. Jeanne Abrams, page 53.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
